description: Sophie P¨¦tronin was abducted in Mali in 2016 and is known as the last French hostage in the world.
title: Sophie P¨¦tronin: Hopes rise for release of French hostage in Mali
title_page: Sophie P¨¦tronin: Hopes rise for release of French hostage in Mali - BBC News
maintext: She has appeared in two hostage videos and at one point her son went to a local mediator who said the kidnappers were prepared to accept a ransom for her release. In one video, in June 2018, she appealed for help from President Emmanuel Macron, looking tired and gaunt. She was suffering from cancer and malaria at the time of her abduction.
